Uses of Class
osyfe.graphic.Texture.Config

  • Packages that use Texture.Config 
    Package Description
    osyfe.graphic
    Manages graphical OpenGL objects.

    • Uses of Texture.Config in osyfe.graphic

      Methods in osyfe.graphic that return Texture.Config 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.alpha()
      Disables RGB and enables alpha.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.border_color(float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Specifies the border color.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.filter_linear()
      Linear texture zooming (the default).
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.filter_nearest()
      Rounded texture zooming.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.linearRGB()
      Sets linear RGB color data interpretation.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.mag_filter_linear()
      Linear texture in zooming (the default).
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.mag_filter_nearest()
      Rounded texture in zooming.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.min_filter_linear()
      Linear texture out zooming (the default).
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.min_filter_nearest()
      Rounded texture out zooming.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.mipmap_filter_linear()
      Linear mipmap interpolation (the default).
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.mipmap_filter_nearest()
      Rounded mipmap interpolation.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.mipmap(boolean generate)
      Enable/disable mipmap generation (default: true).
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.nonLinearRGB()
      Sets non-linear sRGB color data interpretation (the default).
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.rgb()
      Enables RGB and disables alpha (the default).
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.rgba()
      Enables RGB and alpha.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.wrap_clamp_to_border()
      Texture coordinates are clamped to the specified border color.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.wrap_clamp_to_border(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are clamped to the specified border color.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.wrap_clamp_to_edge()
      Texture coordinates are clamped to the edge color (the default).
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.wrap_clamp_to_edge(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are clamped to the edge color (the default).
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.wrap_mirrored_reapeat()
      Texture coordinates are repeated mirrored.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.wrap_mirrored_reapeat(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are repeated mirrored.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.wrap_repeat()
      Texture coordinates are repeated.
      Texture.Config Texture.Config.wrap_repeat(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are repeated.
      Constructors in osyfe.graphic with parameters of type Texture.Config 
      Constructor and Description
      Texture(java.lang.String filename, Texture.Config config)
      Creates a new texture from the given file and the given configurations.
